reviews.content: Not working on iOS 13.3 with iPad.
Causes SpringBoard crash when activating shade. iOS 14.2, iPhone 8 Plus
Crashes to safe mode immediately on Nougat NC swipe down, caused by libpalette.dylib.

Love it!! Didnâ€™t know I would love to see this on iOS! I wish there was more customization so I could make it a bit wider, change colors, and make it rounder, those settings would be awesome! Other than anything, really great tweak!
